record.name: Send Notification when Problem has root cause to be found

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Root Cause found to Opened By
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save)"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Root Cause found to Opened By (when ( Expression: not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save)))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Root Cause found to Problem Coordinators
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save)"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PM.Root Cause found to Problem Coordinators (when ( Expression: not null(root.cause in $L.file) and null(root.cause in $L.file.save)))
